name: Intro
commands: Max, there's still no sign of anything.|Is there any point still hanging around in the dark and cold if we yield no results?
But... There has to be something...|The book definitely said there were magic weeds that bloom in this area at night!
Please tell me you were not in the fiction section.
Of course not! I think...|But the excerpt said it would grant anyone immense magical power!|You'd finally be able to cast magic!|Is that not a dream come true?
Dreaming... Well, at the moment I would rather be sleeping.
Hmph, I guess you're right.|We'd be toast if we couldn't make it home...|Where's Eff?
He'll just bored of this fruitless search, like I am.
I don't know, he's probably just lost in his books, as always.|Wait, here he comes!
So, Eff, are you ready to head home?
Not just yet, there's a lady being harassed by bandits headed this way!
But, what if she gets hurt?
No skin off our backs.|Besides, we're no militia.
Tch! Fine. What about a potential reward?
Rewards?|A noble's duty is to help the commoners... That should be enough!|...And the praise of my family!
You 'zere! Cease your running!|You know zat you cannot escape!
Huff... Huff...|Please... I don't know what you want from me!
Likely excuse.|Hand yourself over now and 'zen ve'll give you a merciful death!
Hoho!'Zen we'll have to beat you down, for the boss!
Sounds serious...|But I'm certain they're no match for us!
Best be careful...|I have an hunch that they're no bandits.
